metadataAttributes.Title: CAD and Digital Manufacturing Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Start your Career in Digital Manufacturing. Practice your CAD/CAM/CAE skills and learn about industry trends, while creating your own drone.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Autodesk, Manufacturing Processes, Sustainable Design, Mechanical Design, 3d modeling, Autocad,
